profile:
Abell Pest Control is a family owned Canadian company dedicated to providing effective, professional and courteous service in pest management. Started in 1924 with one office, Abell now employs several hundred people with branch offices across Canada and the United States.

Guaranteed Pest Control in Canada

Control of mice, roaches, ants, wasps, animals and dozens of other pests
-Full money-back guarantee
-FREE no-obligation quote
-Effective, safe and fast pest elimination

Guaranteed Pest Control
Pests bring dirt, disease, and discomfort through their bites and droppings. Effective, safe and fast elimination of the pest is what you need now.

Fast & Safe Elimination
Controlling pests can be done safely and effectively by a trained professional. Effective pest control is a three-step process:

1)-Identification: Our pest control technician will review your property to find the nature and extent of the pest infestation. The most important element is locating the source of the infestation.
2)-Elimination: Once the pests have been identified and located, your technician will safely eliminate the infestation -- guaranteed*.
3)-Prevention: After the pest infestation is eliminated, your technician will provide you with a complete review of your property, making specific recommendations to help keep the pests away permanently.


Guaranteed Extermination
Your contractual pest is Gone and Guaranteed. If you are not satisfied with the services provided to you within the guarantee period, you will receive a Full Money Back Refund!

* All Abell Service Recommendations must be complied with and follow up services allowed for during the guarantee period to be eligible for any refund. Call for details.

Our goal is to be the most customer orientated pest control provider in Alberta. We focus our efforts not only towards safe, efficient and result driven services, but to build a long-lasting relationship with our customers educating as we go. Our Pest Control Calgary technicians are trained to provide you with the most up-to-date chemical applications ensuring the treatment is done right the first time, without any issues. Spartan Pest Control provides both Residential Treatments and Commercial Pest Control year-round, protecting your family and customers from potential pest threats.

profile:
Martin’s Pest Control is a family owned and locally operated Calgary business. Our priority is building relationships of trust with our customers and providing peace of mind and professional service to Calgary and surrounding communities in southern Alberta.
 
All of our technicians are Alberta licenced and receive on-going training to ensure they remain leaders in our industry and on top of the latest treatment techniques and developments.
 
Life is better with great quality pest control and that is what we offer at Martin’s Pest Control, great quality! Our priority is bringing you the best pest management programs and services possible. At Martin’s pest control, you enjoy the advantage of knowledgeable staff working for you, our valued customer. Our phone is answered locally by local people. Your money stays in the community and keeps local people employed locally. The same technician will visit regularly so you will always see a familiar face.
 
At Martin’s pest control our services are designed to rapidly accommodate a wide range of residential and commercial clients. Our knowledgeable technicians have the training, experience, and resources to eliminate all types of destructive pests and protect your home or business. Our highly trained technicians inspect your premises to evaluate and pinpoint exactly how to keep you pest-free and worry-free. Our experts monitor pest activity and respond promptly to your calls. We offer a wide range of personalized programs to meet your needs and we take pride in the service provided and the results achieved.
 
Pests can disrupt your peace of mind, destroy gardens and property structure, and contaminate fabrics

profile:
Grove Eco-friendly Pest Control was created to improve the pest control industry and provide options to clients who want a better way to control the animals that may disturb them. We focus on the humane treatment of wildlife and non-toxic or less-toxic options for insect control. 

We only use pesticides as a last resort at Grove by following the tenets of Integrated Pest Management (IPM). IPM consists of controlling the pest through many other means before using pesticides, such as habitat modification (i.e. cleaning), biological control, exclusion, and mechanical removal. This ensures a long-term solution, not just a temporary quick-fix. It is also safe for the environment, pets, and children. 

We also provide permanent solutions for wildlife, so you aren't paying the pest control company again and again!
services: Insect control, Rodent control, Wildlife Removal and exclusion, Commercial Services
name: Grove Eco-friendly Pest Control

profile:
Cal-Rid Exterminators is a family owned pest control company dedicated to servicing both residential and commercial customers since 1958. Cal-Rid Exterminators provides service 7 days a week with evening technicians available for emergency calls. Our COR certification and dedication in ensuring that all of our jobs are assessed for safety to the public, children, wildlife and the environment helps us understand the care required when dealing with our customers. Our staff continues to grow yearly, guaranteeing we have the manpower necessary to fulfill any requirements set.
